results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እናንተ ትፈጥሩታላችሁን? ወይስ እኛ ፈጣሪዎቹን ነን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እኛ ሞትን (ጊዜውን) በመካከላችሁ ወሰንን፡፡ እኛም ተሸናፊዎች አይደለንም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ብጤዎቻችሁን በመለወጥና በዚያ በማታውቁትም (ቅርጽ) እናንተን በመፍጠር ላይ (አንሸነፍም)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
